title: Bradycardia; Pulse Present
description: Protocol for managing bradycardia with pulse present, including decision pathways and reversible causes

is_symptomatic.text: Heart Rate < 60/min AND Symptomatic? (Hypotension, Acute AMS, Ischemic Chest Pain, Acute CHF, Seizures, Syncope, or Shock secondary to bradycardia. Typically HR < 50/min)

airway_protocol_if_indicated.text: Airway Protocol(s) AR-1, AR-2, AR-3 if indicated

respiratory_distress_if_indicated.text: Respiratory Distress Protocol AR-4 if indicated

chest_pain_if_indicated.text: Chest Pain: Cardiac and STEMI Protocol AC-4 if indicated

details: Evaluate patient for all reversible causes

reversible_causes_list.text: Reversible Causes: Hypovolemia, Hypoxia, Hydrogen ion (acidosis), Hypothermia, Hypo/Hyperkalemia, Tension pneumothorax, Tamponade (cardiac), Toxins, Thrombosis - pulmonary (PE), Thrombosis - coronary (MI)
reversible_causes_list.note: Address reversible causes as they are identified

check_beta_blocker_ccb.text: Suspected Beta-Blocker or Calcium Channel Blocker Overdose?

overdose_toxic_ingestion_protocol.text: Follow Overdose / Toxic Ingestion Protocol TE-7

fluid_bolus.text: Normal Saline Fluid Bolus 500 mL – 2 L IV/IO (Unless Acute CHF) Maximum 2 L

atropine.text: Atropine 1 mg IV/IO - May repeat every 3-5 minutes, Maximum 3 mg

vasopressor_infusion.text: Vasopressor Infusion - Epinephrine 1-10 mcg/min IV/IO titrate to SBP ≥ 90 mmHg OR Dopamine 2-20 mcg/kg/min IV/IO titrate to SBP ≥ 90 mmHg

details.epinephrine: 1-10 mcg/min IV/IO, titrate to SBP ≥ 90 mmHg
details.dopamine: 2-20 mcg/kg/min IV/IO, titrate to SBP ≥ 90 mmHg
details.alternative: Use either medication based on availability and protocol

decisionLabel.no: No - No improvement, proceed to pacing

transcutaneous_pacing.text: If No Improvement - Start Transcutaneous Pacing (TCP). Consider earlier in 2nd or 3rd degree AV block
details: Consider earlier in 2nd or 3rd degree AV block

consider_sedation.text: Consider Sedation - Midazolam 2-2.5 mg IV/IO/IM/IN, Maximum 10 mg (for pacing sedation)

notify_destination_medical_control.text: Notify Destination or Contact Medical Control
